PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : real or complex square matrix (n x n).
: two real or complex matrices (n x n).

DESCRIPTION.P: produces two matrices L and U such that A = L*U with U upper triangular and L lower triangular up to a permutation of the rows.
If A has rank k, rows k+1 to n of U are zero.
produces three matrices L, U and E such that E*A = L*U with U upper triangular and E*L lower triangular for a permutation matrix E.

ITEMIZE.label: REMARK
ITEMIZE.P: If A is a real matrix, using the function lufact and luget it is possible to obtain the permutation matrices and also when A is not full rank the column compression of the matrix L.
